data.title: Software Developer - TCS
data.description:
Built the Advocate Portal to speed up insurance claim data collection, cutting processing time and making customers happier by 15%.
            Gave the database a serious upgrade, reducing errors by 15% and boosting efficiency by 20%.
            Made file uploads smarter—users now save 40% time filling forms and don’t have to start over when reopening them.
            Processed uploaded files like a pro with data validations and optimizations, making uploads and downloads a breeze.
            Wrote SQL stored procedures to automate tasks and keep things running smoothly across multiple tables.
            Worked with Spring Boot, JDBC, ReactJS, OracleSQL, and MySQL—and even used the JXL library for Excel magic.
            Kept the code squeaky clean with SonarQube, tackled website glitches, and polished up the UI.
            data fetching to make big queries faster by 25%, giving users a snappier experience.

data.title: SDE Intern - Uolo
data.description: Developed API data logic for smooth JSON to structured data conversion, enhancing user experience in a Teaching and Learning app. Designed scalable UI for OTP and Ledger using Flutter and BLOC pattern, managing states and errors effectively. Resolved Web View data persistence issue using local storage, resulting in 5% higher user retention.
